name: ummer
tagline: ummer is a little command line tool for browsing webMethods Universal Messaging Server.
body:
### Welcome to the ummer project page
ummer is a little tool for dealing on the [webMethods Universal Messaging (UM)](http://www.terracotta.org/products/universal-messaging)  on the command line.

The client libraries of the UM are proprietary. Hence they are not included in the release.

### Prerequisites
You do need a Java JRE 8. Get it from [here](https://www.java.com/en/download/).

### Installation
1. Download the zip
2. Extract it
3. Copy from <path to UM>/UniversalMessaging/lib the files
    * nAdminAPI.jar
    * nClient.jar
    * nP2P.jar
    into the folder <path to ummer>/umLib
4. Done!

### Usage
From the command line just hit `<path to ummer>/bin/ummer` and the usage help list show up.

#### Show all queues
`./ummer -r nsp://127.0.0.1 --listQueues`
```
/de/kazkazi/me
/de/kazkazi/Simple
/de/kazkazi/test
```

#### Show all topics
`ummer -r nsp://127.0.0.1 --listTopics`
```
/de/kazkazi/aChannel
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
